channel.title: 319 deob client & server help
channel.description:
I'm trying to get my 319 deob to connect to an allstar base and i've got some progress but im stuck on this.
[b]Server Console[/b]
[code]F2p city is now online _________________________
[null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 0 but expected 10 [null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 0 but expected 10 [null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 31 but expected 10 [null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 72 but expected 10 [null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 100 but expected 10 [null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 120 but expected 10 [null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 103 but expected 10 [null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 116 but expected 10 [null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 71 but expected 10 [null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 34 but expected 10 [null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 53 but expected 10 [null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 73 but expected 10 [null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 27 but expected 10 [null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 115 but expected 10 [null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 118 but expected 10 [null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 79 but expected 10 [null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 0 but expected 10 [null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 51 but expected 10 [/code]
Code in client.java (Server) [code] tmp = inStream.readUnsignedByte(); if (tmp != 10) { Exception("Encrypted packet Id was " + tmp + " but expected 10"); return; }[/code]
i have a basic idea of what needs to happen but no idea how to do it i know that either i need to edit the client so it sends the packet id 10 instead of a random one every time or allow the server to accept a random one every time. i dont really want to be spoonfed so if someone could just try to explain it to be a little better first that would help.

item.title: 319 deob client & server help
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

I’m trying to get my 319 deob to connect to an allstar base and i’ve got some progress but im stuck on this.

Server Console

[code]F2p city is now online

[null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 0 but expected 10
[null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 0 but expected 10
[null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 31 but expected 10
[null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 72 but expected 10
[null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 100 but expected 10
[null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 120 but expected 10
[null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 103 but expected 10
[null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 116 but expected 10
[null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 71 but expected 10
[null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 34 but expected 10
[null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 53 but expected 10
[null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 73 but expected 10
[null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 27 but expected 10
[null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 115 but expected 10
[null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 118 but expected 10
[null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 79 but expected 10
[null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 0 but expected 10
[null]: Exception: Encrypted packet Id was 51 but expected 10
[/code]

Code in client.java (Server)

tmp = inStream.readUnsignedByte(); if (tmp != 10) { Exception("Encrypted packet Id was " + tmp + " but expected 10"); return; }

i have a basic idea of what needs to happen but no idea how to do it i know that either i need to edit the client so it sends the packet id 10 instead of a random one every time or allow the server to accept a random one every time. i dont really want to be spoonfed so if someone could just try to explain it to be a little better first that would help.

Read full topic
